meanings.definition: A contagious bacterial infection affecting the eyes, characterized by inflammation and discharge.
meanings.sent1: Trachomas can spread easily in crowded areas.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with trachomas.
meanings.sent3: The school had to close temporarily due to an outbreak of trachomas among students.
meanings.sent4: Her tears flowed like trachomas, infecting everything in their path.
meanings.sent5: The redness and swelling of trachomas made the eyes look like tiny volcanoes erupting.

meanings.definition: The plural form of trachoma, a disease of the eye caused by infection with the bacterium Chlamydia trachomatis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor treated many patients with trachomas in the clinic.
meanings.sent2: The village was known for its high number of trachomas cases.
meanings.sent3: The trachomas in the eye chart seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The trachomas in the community were like a silent army, slowly spreading.
meanings.sent5: The severity of trachomas in the region was alarming to health officials.
